if.test: searchStartDate != null and searchStartDate != '' and searchEndDate != null and searchEndDate != ''

sql.if: AND BRD_FAQ_REG_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchStartDate},'-', '')||'000000' AND REPLACE(#{searchEndDate},'-', '')||'235959'

mapper.select: /* FaqBoard.selectFaqBoardListCount */ SELECT COUNT(BRD_FAQ_IDX) FROM T_BRD_FAQ WHERE 1=1

/* FaqBoard.selectFaqBoardList */ SELECT S2.* , ( SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_UP_IDX = #{FAQ_INQUIRY_TYPE_CODE} AND CMN_COM_ETC1 = S2.BRD_FAQ_BRAND_CD )AS BRD_FAQ_BRAND_NM, ( SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = S2.BRD_CMN_COM_UP_IDX )AS BRD_CMN_COM_UP_NM, ( SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = S2.BRD_CMN_COM_IDX )AS BRD_CMN_COM_NM, ( SELECT ADM_MST_NM FROM T_ADM_MST WHERE ADM_MST_ID = S2.BRD_FAQ_REG_ID )AS BRD_FAQ_REG_NM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, S1.* FROM ( SELECT BRD_FAQ_IDX, BRD_FAQ_OFTEN_YN, BRD_CMN_COM_UP_IDX, BRD_CMN_COM_IDX, BRD_FAQ_TITLE, BRD_FAQ_CONTENTS, NVL(BRD_FAQ_READ_CNT, 0) AS BRD_FAQ_READ_CNT, BRD_FAQ_USE_YN, BRD_FAQ_REG_DT, BRD_FAQ_REG_IP, BRD_FAQ_REG_ID, BRD_FAQ_UPD_DT, BRD_FAQ_UPD_IP, BRD_FAQ_UPD_ID, BRD_FAQ_BRAND_CD FROM T_BRD_FAQ WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY BRD_FAQ_REG_DT DESC ) S1 ) S2 WHERE S2.RNUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}

/* FaqBoard.selectFaqBoardInfo */ SELECT BRD_FAQ_IDX, BRD_FAQ_OFTEN_YN, BRD_CMN_COM_IDX, BRD_FAQ_TITLE, BRD_FAQ_CONTENTS, NVL(BRD_FAQ_READ_CNT, 0) AS BRD_FAQ_READ_CNT, BRD_FAQ_USE_YN, BRD_FAQ_REG_DT, BRD_FAQ_REG_IP, BRD_FAQ_REG_ID, BRD_FAQ_UPD_DT, BRD_FAQ_UPD_IP, BRD_FAQ_UPD_ID, BRD_FAQ_BRAND_CD, BRD_CMN_COM_UP_IDX, ( SELECT ADM_MST_NM FROM T_ADM_MST WHERE ADM_MST_ID = BRD_FAQ_REG_ID )AS BRD_FAQ_REG_NM, ( SELECT CMN_COM_IDX FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_ETC1 = BRD_FAQ_BRAND_CD AND CMN_COM_TOP_IDX = #{CMN_COM_TOP_IDX} )AS BRD_FAQ_BRAND_IDX FROM T_BRD_FAQ WHERE BRD_FAQ_IDX = #{BRD_FAQ_IDX}
/* FaqBoard.selectFaqBoardOftenTopCount */ SELECT COUNT(BRD_FAQ_IDX) FROM T_BRD_FAQ WHERE BRD_FAQ_USE_YN = 'Y' AND BRD_FAQ_OFTEN_YN = 'Y' AND BRD_FAQ_BRAND_CD = #{BRD_FAQ_BRAND_CD}
mapper.insert: /* FaqBoard.insertFaqBoard */ INSERT INTO T_BRD_FAQ ( BRD_FAQ_IDX, BRD_FAQ_OFTEN_YN, BRD_CMN_COM_IDX, BRD_FAQ_TITLE, BRD_FAQ_CONTENTS, BRD_FAQ_READ_CNT, BRD_FAQ_USE_YN, BRD_FAQ_REG_DT, BRD_FAQ_REG_IP, BRD_FAQ_REG_ID, BRD_FAQ_BRAND_CD, BRD_CMN_COM_UP_IDX ) VALUES ( SEQ_BRD_FAQ_IDX.NEXTVAL, NVL(#{BRD_FAQ_OFTEN_YN}, 'N'), #{BRD_CMN_COM_IDX}, #{BRD_FAQ_TITLE}, #{BRD_FAQ_CONTENTS:CLOB}, 0, NVL(#{BRD_FAQ_USE_YN}, 'N'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{BRD_FAQ_REG_IP}, #{BRD_FAQ_REG_ID}, #{BRAND_CD}, #{BRD_CMN_COM_UP_IDX} )
mapper.update: /* FaqBoard.updateFaqBoard */ UPDATE T_BRD_FAQ SET BRD_FAQ_OFTEN_YN = NVL(#{BRD_FAQ_OFTEN_YN}, 'N'), BRD_CMN_COM_IDX = #{BRD_CMN_COM_IDX}, BRD_FAQ_TITLE = #{BRD_FAQ_TITLE}, BRD_FAQ_CONTENTS = #{BRD_FAQ_CONTENTS:CLOB}, BRD_FAQ_USE_YN = NVL(#{BRD_FAQ_USE_YN}, 'N'), BRD_FAQ_UPD_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), BRD_FAQ_UPD_IP = #{BRD_FAQ_UPD_IP}, BRD_FAQ_UPD_ID = #{BRD_FAQ_UPD_ID}, BRD_CMN_COM_UP_IDX = #{BRD_CMN_COM_UP_IDX} WHERE BRD_FAQ_IDX = #{BRD_FAQ_IDX}
mapper.select: /* FaqBoard.selectFaqCategoryList */ SELECT CMN_COM_IDX, CMN_COM_NM, CMN_COM_LEVEL, CMN_COM_UP_IDX, CMN_COM_TOP_IDX, CMN_COM_ETC1, CMN_COM_ETC2, CMN_COM_ETC3, CMN_COM_SORT, CMN_COM_USE_YN FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_UP_IDX=#{CMN_COM_IDX} ORDER BY CMN_COM_SORT ASC
